bibl.bibl: Saporta, Gaston de. 1862–5. Etudes sur la végétation du sud-est de la France à l’époque tertiaire. Annales des sciences naturelles (botanique) 4th ser. 16 (1862): 309–45; 17 (1862): 191–311; 19 (1863): 5–124; 5th ser. 3 (1865): 5–152; 4 (1865): 5–264.
bibl.idno: SF6 P382.c.45 The next two articles in this series do not include "a l’epoque tertiare", so I made separate entry. The last three articles in the series are a supplement, so I also separated. I included year of each article just for clarity.
